name: FilterCriteria
description: Represents the filtering criteria applied to a column.

properties.name: criterion1
properties.description: The first criterion used to filter data. Used as an operator in the case of "custom" filtering.

properties.name: criterion2
properties.description: The second criterion used to filter data. Only used as an operator in the case of "custom" filtering.

properties.name: color
properties.description: The HTML color string used to filter cells. Used with "cellColor" and "fontColor" filtering.

properties.name: operator
properties.description: The operator used to combine criterion 1 and 2 when using "custom" filtering.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: The icon used to filter cells. Used with "icon" filtering.

properties.name: dynamicCriteria
properties.description: The dynamic criteria from the Excel.DynamicFilterCriteria set to apply on this column. Used with "dynamic" filtering.

properties.name: values
properties.description: The set of values to be used as part of "values" filtering.

properties.name: filterOn
properties.description: The property used by the filter to determine whether the values should stay visible.
